channel.title: Free Roli Iphone app & category request
channel.description:
Hey :smile:
A little bit off topic, but did anyone see the Roli seabord Iphone app? Pretty fun little toy. EDIT just tested it and it doesnt support midi out, only midi in: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sGKtTgEPa_E
Btw., could we have a category for stuff not related to Axoloti? :) Like free apps, inspirational videos etc.? Like this link for example?
Have a great weekend everyone :)

item.title: Free Roli Iphone app & category request
item.dc:creator: @anon5189335
item.description:
@anon5189335 wrote:

Yeah probably, Well, since no one answered it was probably not a good enough idea.

Read full topic
item.source: Free Roli Iphone app & category request

item.title: Free Roli Iphone app & category request
item.dc:creator: @keyman Antonio Machado
item.description:
@keyman wrote:

Think there are plenty of forums out there that support these themes, just me saying...

NOISE:
It does support MPE so its fun to play using a Linnstrumment, Soundplane, Eigenharp or Continuum (or some craziness that address those MIDI CCs )

Wish you also a good weekend

Read full topic
